summary: Need way to name where apps are publicly

comments.content:
Need a new controller that can show where the apps in this instance are as
well as report on cpu / mem usage

summary: Finding app.yaml is done incorrectly on jaiku

comments.content:
The way we locate the app.yaml file in the tar'ed appengine app doesn't
correctly find it for Jaiku.

Problem occurred since there was more than one app.yaml file in the tarball. Behavior
is now as follows:

If there is no app.yaml file, we fail and ask them to put one in.

If there is only one, we take it.

If there is greater than one, we fail, list all the app.yaml files, and ask them to
remove the extras.

summary: Current image type is only c1.xlarge

comments.content: Change this later to be other sizes (ec2-run-instances instance-type)

Can't be fixed in current version of AppScale since Eucalyptus has a known bug
(http://eucalyptus.cs.ucsb.edu/ticket/44) where multiple image types can't be used.
Will add in a command line argument to appscale-run-instances (defaults to c1.xlarge
if not present) and propogate it to the AppControllers as needed for use spawning up VMs.
Change made, will verify in next test version.
